title: ECLECTIC RESONANCE UPRISING 2
price: Pre-Order & Event Price: 12€ / 2000 yen | Post Release Price: 15€ / 2300 yen

01.title: Debut
description: • Additional Mastering: Loudness Adjustment, Outro Fadeout Fix
• Used VSTs & Samples: Serum, Tape Cassette, Brainworks Opto, Purple Audio MC77, Kilohearts plugins
• About this track: Debut was a challenge to see if I could make Frenchcore at 130bpm. It eventually turned into a mash of all sorts of genres as my attention span and time ran out.

05.title: Volition

06.title: Meanwhile, in 2016
description: • Programmed, Produced & Mixed by Afflected Light
• Used VSTs & Samples: Korg M1, Serum, Vital, Massive, Kontakt, Dune 3, Cymatics - Terror Drums For Dubstep, MYLK - Voocalcium

• About this track: This track is reminiscent of Dubstep in 2016. Songs like "Like a Bitch" by Zomboy; "Juices" by Virtual Riot & Dubloadz or "Full Control" by Ray Volpe... 'twas a simpler time back then. But that's also what my new (old) alias "Afflected Light" is all about - EDM Nostalgia! - ReeK

07.title: Heavenstasis
description: • Programmed, Produced, Mixed & Mastered by PSYQUO
• Additional Mastering: Loudness Adjustment, Minor EQing
• Used VSTs & Samples: Korg M1, Serum, Vital, Massive, Kontakt, Dune 3, Cymatics - Terror Drums For Dubstep, MYLK - Voocalcium
• About this track: Are you in reach? This so called utopia? This world, ever changing. With hope, the conflict resolves. To Heavenstasis.

08.title: Cymbidium
description: • Programmed, Produced, Mixed & Mastered by V0iD (The Cynphetic Collective)
• About this track: Minimlalist elements that explode at the drop.
Never thought I'd be falling for you
Could I not be more upset with you?
I want you thinking bout me when you fall asleep at night
I want you thinking about me even when I'm outta sight
You like to put things into my head
So obessed over what you said baby
But all you do is just sit there while I'm losing my mind
Never thought I'd be falling for you
Could I not be more upset with you?
I don't understand how it could kill you if you gave it a try
And what would it be like if you dated a criminal who's falling for you
And you know you're gettin older when you
Realize in that the love was true
When you, see the pictures with you and I~
Never thought I'd be falling for you
Could I not be more upset with you?

• About this track: This track was originally created for a Sound Voltex custom chart we made with a few friends, but it ended up not releasing. So, I made an extended version! Name is inspired by 1116 - It's a nod to my french friends who helped me decide on the name back in December and with whom I share a big love for 1116. Also the deadline was originally 2022-12-11 (11/12).

09.title: INTERGALACTIC B-HOP
description: • Used VSTs & Samples: Serum, Waves Renaissance Bundle, probably OPS Hardcore/ Uptempo vol 1
• About this track: Not even half an A press could get you ready for this one.

10.title: Tryst in the Lightfields
description: • Programmed, Produced & Mixed by Hal Binderman
• Used VSTs & Samples: Sonic Charge's Synplant, Plogue's chipsounds, Synapse's Antidote RE (Reason), Doru Malaia's "Sex!Sex!Sex!" Refill (Reason)
• About this track: Intimate human connection in a hostile, synthetic environment.

11.title: Terminal Wish
description: • About this track: <-+-x-+-> / WITH IMPENDING DOOM INFRONT OF YOUR EYES / KNOWING YOU WILL NOT HAVE ENOUGH AIR TO SURVIVE / WHAT WILL BE THE LAST THING YOU WISH FOR

12.title: MELTDOWN
description: • About this track: This track was a very technical one that challenged me on many levels. Yet, despite the arduousness of programming ridiculously frenetic breakcore chops, the difficulty I had making a rhythmically reasonable trap section in 7/4, and the headaches I gave myself trying to properly mix the overblown chorus... it was all rather fulfilling. Maximal music tends to be tough for me, and it's always exciting when I pull it off to some degree. In this case, I feel like I've proved a lot to myself about my capabilities and knowhow.

13.title: Mind Catharsis
description: • Programmed, Produced, Mixed & Mastered by blobdash
• Used VSTs & Samples: Saturate, Infiltrator, Serum, Vital, Rift Filter Lite, LFOTool
• About this track: i'm never beating the breakcore producer allegations

15.title: Ouroboros
description: • Programmed, Produced, Mixed & Mastered by Supire (NH)
• Additional Mastering: Dynamic EQing, Loudness Adjustment, Compression
A song about someone who keeps dying fighting a strong enemy, but never fails to come back to life and keep fighting, indomitably.
強敵の前に何度も倒されて死ぬが、何度もよみがえり挑み続ける不屈の不死者の曲です。
